Title: FortnitePorting v3.0.0
Text: Please stop using Fortnite Porting V2 and update to V3!!

Title: FortnitePorting v2.2.6
Text: Bug fixes for Fortnite v34.00

Title: FortnitePorting v2.2.2
Text: Lots of fixes for Fortnite v32.00

Title: FortnitePorting v2.2.1
Text: Fixes skeletal mesh CLR crashes

Title: FortnitePorting v2.2.0
Text: Release because the new season caused issues and I didn't want to bump to v2.1.14

Title: FortnitePorting v2.1.13
Text: Beans.

Title: FortnitePorting v2.1.12
Text: Fixes for Fortnite v30.20

Title: FortnitePorting v2.1.10
Text: Official fix for Fortnite v30.10

Title: FortnitePorting v2.1.8
Text: Fixed way too many bugs.

Title: FortnitePorting v2.1.4
Text: Fixed most shape keys not importing for characters.

Title: FortnitePorting v2.1.3
Text: Fixed an infinite loop bug when importing metahuman skins.

Title: FortnitePorting v2.1.2
Text: Adds a mappings toggle for custom install mode and fixes stw skins, resources, and metahuman facial pose jaws.

Title: FortnitePorting v2.1.1
Text: Fixes importing non-character assets.

Title: FortnitePorting v2.1.0
Text: Big feature update incoming!! Facial Poses/Animations are finally back along with a new WIP texture viewer and support for SVT texture export!!

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.10
Text:
Fixed the bug that caused the UI to rotate upside down.
#FortnitePortingFlipped

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.8
Text: Fixes static meshes and .umap export for the newest Fortnite season. For once Fortnite Porting got fixed before the servers are up!! (jk love u epic games)

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.7
Text: A small patch update to load all mappings types instead of just Oodle.

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.6
Text: A bunch of little QoL features. Nothing much new other than a UEFN map loading toggle, item filters, and Blender sound export. Tasty rig is fixed on 100x scale and custom export path works again. (or for the first time since it's always been broken? lol)

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.5
Text: Fixes issues for Fortnite v28.20, adds the backup API back, and has more descriptive error messages. (If you are encountering any stupid errors still, make a support ticket and I will make em more descript)

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.4
Text:
Just a small little feature update!!
Features:
- Lobby Pose Export
- 3D Cursor Spawn Location Option
- Toggle Dynamic Bone Shape Option
- Prefab/Gallery Filters
- Loop Animations (WIP)
- Fish Eye Textures

Tweaks
- Rarity Color Accuracy
- Asset Type Selection
- Filter Panel

Bug Fixes:
- Fix Same-Name Material Overrides
- Infinite Looping Emotes (Shout)
- Radio Tab Issues

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.3
Text: For those of you that complained, individual bone rotation for FK fingers on the Tasty Rig are now working.

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.2
Text: Just a small little patch to fix Blender syncing issues. Along with this there's support for AdditionalWorlds in .umap export. I don't think this is helpful on latest but it's important for pre ue5 versions of Fortnite.

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.1
Text:
Essentially just fixes a lot of the bugs from the official release.
A few notable features for this update include:
- Layered Background Diffuse
- Layered Alpha
- Finger IK Controls

Title: FortnitePorting v2.0.0
Text: Fortnite Porting v2 is finally here!! Enjoy all the new features and make sure to make a support ticket if you're having any issues. <3
